dmca.title: Convonix complains of copies
dmca.body:
Hi,

Please find below the list of URL's and reference to the copied text/images within the body of this email as required by you - 


Thanks again for following up,
Regards,
[private].


---------------

1. (a) Copyrighted URL: www.convonix.com

   (b) Allegedly infringing URL: 
http://www.creativeindia.net/search_engine_optimisation_&_web_marketing.html

   (c) BRIEF reference to the text/images - 

We offer comprehensive Search engine optimization programs, which include:


Website Review:
The first step in the process of SEO involves the identification of spider stoppers in a website. These may include broken links, Non-optimized titles, missing tags, 

non-optimized link structure among other factors.


Competition Analysis:
Websites of competitors, which have undergone search engine optimization sometimes, offer valuable clues with regards to the right keywords to target. Also studying the 

competition helps us identify and finalise the SEO optimization plan for your website.


Keyword Identification:
Many websites in spite of ranking high, do not get enough traffic. This maybe because the keywords that they are targeting may not be the keywords being searched for, on 

the search engines. Keyword identification is a very important part of search engine optimization and includes researching keywords using various resources in the quest for 


finding related yet popular phrases.

Page Optimization:
This step in the process of SEO involves the actual optimization of your web pages. Here pages will be optimized with regards to tags, link structures, images, body text, 


and other visible and invisible parts.

Building Incoming Links:
A good link building campaign is the key to achieving good rankings for competitive keywords. Our link exchange campaigns are human powered, and done completely manually. 


This step of SEO involves Identifying potential link partners - These are websites which complement your website in content and have a good search engine presence 
Securing The Link Exchange - This involves contacting the webmasters or site owners and getting our link reciprocated 


Manual Submissions to search engines and directories:
Manual Submissions to search engines and directories is a process often referred as search engine submissions. Many advertise a quick and simple software or service which 


helps submit to over 1000 engines for a few dollars, but few tell you that it is the top 10 engines that command over 85% of the internets search engine traffic. 

Our search engine optimization campaign involves systematic submissions, done manually, to the top search engines and directories


Analysis and Tweaking:
Search engine optimization is a long-term solution to your traffic woes. Our comprehensive search engine optimization packages involve continuous fine tuning of the website 

based on traffic trends and ranking trends. Search engines often change their algorithms... We tweak your website to compensate of the changes, hence enabling you to stay 


on top. 

SEO Campaign Tracking :
Our inhouse web analytics application helps track not only traffic but also the conversion rates and ROI on your search engine optimization and other web marketing 


initiatives. The beta version of our campaign tracker allows live reporting and highlights ranking trends for each key-phrase in the search engine optimization campaign.

Comprehensive Reporting:
We believe in keeping our clients informed. Our comprehensive SEO reporting process helps you, our client know about the exact schedule and steps that we follow for the 


search engine optimization of your website.

	-------------------------------------------

Website Review
The first step in SEO is the process involves the identification of spider stoppers in a website. These may include broken links, Non-optimized titles, missing tags, 


non-optimized link structure among other factors. 
 
Competition Analysis
Websites of competitors, which have undergone search engine placement sometimes, offer valuable clues with regards to the right keywords to target. Also studying the 


competition helps us identify and finalise the optimization plan for your website.

Many websites in spite of ranking high, do not get enough traffic. This maybe because the keywords that they are targeting may not be the keywords being searched for, on 


the search engines. In SEO process Keyword identification is a very important part and includes researching keywords using various resources in the quest for finding

This step in the process of SEO involves the actual optimization of your web pages. Here pages will be optimized with regards to tags, link structures, images, body text, 

and other visible and invisible parts. 

Link Building
A good link exchange campaign is the key to achieving good rankings. Our link exchange campaigns are human powered, and done completely manually. This step involves.

Manual Submissions to search engines and directories
Manual Submissions to search engines and directories is a process often referred as search engine submissions. Many advertise a quick and simple software or service which 


helps submit to over 1000 engines for a few dollars, but few tell you that it is the top 10 engines that command over 85% of the internets search engine traffic. Our

Analysis and Tweaking
SEO is a long-term solution to your traffic woes. Our comprehensive search engine optimization packages involve continuous fine tuning of the website based on traffic 

trends and ranking trends. Search engines often change their algorithms... We tweak your website to compensate of the changes, hence enabling you to stay on top. 

SEO Campaign Tracking
Our inhouse web analytics application helps track not only traffic but also the conversion rates and ROI on your seo and other web marketing initiatives. The beta version 

of our campaign tracker allows live reporting and highlights ranking trends for each key-phrase in the website optimization campaign. 

 
Comprehensive Reporting
We believe in keeping our clients informed. Our comprehensive reporting process helps you, our client, know about the exact schedule and steps that we follow for the search 

engine optimization of your website.

6. (a) Copyrighted URL: www.convonix.com

   (b) Allegedly infringing URL: 
http://www.web-development-company.com/web_promotion.htm

   (c) BRIEF reference to the text - 

 
Search engine optimization is the art of placing your website in the first few pages of a search engine for a strategically defined set of keywords. Search engine 


optimization leads to an increase in targeted traffic to your internet property thus resulting in more leads and sales. 

Major search engines command over 400 million searches everyday, day after day. Search engine optimization helps you get this piece of the pie, which you might be losing 


otherwise to your competition 

Search engine optimization offers a much better return on investment compared to banner campaigns or pay per click campaigns 

Search engine optimization helps you capture targeted traffic... people who are already looking for the product or service you offer 




	-------------------------------------------

search engine for a strategically defined set of keywords. Search engine optimization (SEO) leads to an increase in targeted traffic

9. (a) Copyrighted URL: www.convonix.com

   (b) Allegedly infringing URL: http://www.infocratsweb.com/seodevelopment.asp


   (c) BRIEF reference to the text - 

Search engine optimization (also known as search engine placement, search engine rankings or SEO) is the art of placing your website in the first few pages of a search 


engine for a strategically defined set of keywords. Search engine optimization (SEO) leads to an increase in targeted traffic to your website, thus resulting in more leads 

and sales.

Why Search Engine Optimization (SEO) ?


Major search engines command over 400 million searches everyday, day after day. Search engine optimization (SEO) helps you get this piece of the pie, which you might be 

losing otherwise to your competition. 

Search engine optimization (SEO) offers a much better return on investment compared to banner campaigns or pay per click campaigns. 
Search engine optimization (SEO) helps you capture targeted traffic... people who are already looking for the product or service you offer . 

Search engine optimization (SEO) is a long term and permanent answer to your traffic woes. Once a website has been optimized for search engines it can stay at the top for 

long periods of time 
Search engine optimization (SEO) results in huge savings on ad-spent using traditional channels of marketing 




	-------------------------------------------
